attributes.action: make it a criminal offence for a politician not to publicly condemn the murder of UK military personnel when presented with an opportunity to do so.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent murder of two UK servicemen in Northern Ireland demonstrates what will happen when politicians appease their opponents, even when those opponents are themselves criminals. No elected and remunerated public official should be entitled to refuse to condemn the murder of UK service personnel.

rejection.details: Your petition effectively calls for the overturning of the legally enshrined right of freedom of thought, speech and conscience.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
